snippet: Jason Collins, celebrated as the first openly gay male athlete still active in a major American team sport, remains in limbo without an N.B.A. team. His wait is being closely watched.
abstract: Free-agent center Jason Collins, celebrated as the first openly gay male athlete still active in a major American team sport, remains in limbo without an NBA team; his wait is being closely watched for its perceived sociological significance, although Collins himself is determined to keep his focus on basketball.
lead_paragraph: Jason Collins, celebrated as the first openly gay male athlete still active in a major American team sport, remains in limbo without an N.B.A. team. His wait is being closely watched.

headline.main: Approval, but No New Team Yet, for Collins
headline.print_headline: Praise, but No New Team, for Collins
